summary:
Samantha 
Good Looking Elemental Nord Mage Lev. 30 with Heal Spell
You need Skyrim + ApachiiSkyHair
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=6][B]Samantha the Elemental Mage [/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=6][B]Follower[/B][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/4627/respond800.jpg[/IMG][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/8877/sam1tg.jpg[/IMG][/CENTER]
First of all , i want to let you know this is my first Upload here . 
Dont know anything about uploading these Files
and i hope it want work for you too.

I try to give you as much Info as i can about this Follower .
I think she\'s worth to try to share her with you guys.
...And sorry for my bad English.
I\'m sure we can work this out.

[B]Story about Samantha:[/B]

There\'s no story ;) . She should work with Skyrim only.

[B]Place you can find her [/B]
[IMG]http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/9476/placetofind.jpg[/IMG]
[B]
[/B]
[B]Mods you need for make her work:[/B]
[SIZE=2][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/URL] [/SIZE]

[B]More Info about her:[/B]
[B]
[/B]

[IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/4382/statsccg.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6032/healingc.jpg[/IMG]
[B]This is what she\'s wearing when you found her:[/B]
[B]
[/B]
Picture is from the buged 1 Version ..
[IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/4343/uebersichtv.jpg[/IMG]

New one
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/341/sam2fs.jpg/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/medium/341/sam2fs.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[B]I also used (but not needed)[/B]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043][SIZE=2]Enhanced Lights and FX[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25389][SIZE=2]Sweet and Sexy Lingerie shop CBBE[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846][SIZE=2]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666][SIZE=2]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709][SIZE=2]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812][SIZE=2]Better Females by Bella[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783][SIZE=2]HN66s Long Eye Lashes[/SIZE][/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/689]Detailed Lips[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933][SIZE=2]Extensible Follower Framework[/SIZE][/URL]

Extensible Follower Framework is also a good UFO replacement if UFO wont work or causing trouble.

If Samantha doesn\'t show up in the Game , you can try to install the Mods in that order: 
1. Place your ApachiiHair.esm plugin after the Update.esm or the bottom of the esm\'s. 
2. Place SamathaWom.esp in the middle or after all the other Character necessary Plugins 
This means first you load all the Textures,body\'s,hair etc... before you place the Charcater Body who needs them. 

This is what i allways think about when i place the Plugins in the right Order. 

Make personal edits at your own risk

PERMISSIONS
Translations or including this companion in other mods must be in compliance with the following: you should PM me for permission, put a visible credit and link back here and keep it Skyrim only.
DO NOT POST THIS COMPANION OR ALTERNATED VERSIONS OF THEM AS YOU OWN WORK

Thanks
&
Good Luck ;)


Special Credits go to:

Apachii,Caliente,Nikitaa,Benjamin318,BellaGail,hothtrooper44,Expired,SparrowPrince,vurt,xp32,dimon99,fore
and all the others to have us use thee great mods and addons.
